textBeforeTable: Unlimited access (for the duration of your subscription) to the Online Price Guide to Irish Art Sales: search 30,000 records of Irish Art sold at auction in Ireland and the UK since 1984, updated quarterly throughout 2015. Unlimited access (for the duration of your subscription) to the IAR Online Archive: browse more than 1,600 articles on Irish art and design published in the Irish Arts Review since 1984. Four editions of the Irish Arts Review, delivered to your home or office.
